extracted_text: Sri Sai Vidya Vikas Shikshana Samithi ® SAI VIDYA INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY (Approved by AICTE, New Delhi, Affiliated to VTU, Recognized by Govt. of Karnataka) NBA Accredited, New Delhi (CSE, ECE, ISE), NAAC – “A” Grade RAJANUKUNTE, BANGALORE 560 064, KARNATAKA DEPARTMENT OF TRAINING AND PLACEMENT Phone: 080-28468191/96/97/98 * E-mail: placement@saividya.ac.in * URL www.saividya.ac.in Ref No: SVIT/ CD - 23 / 2025-2026 Date: 14th November 2025 DEPARTMENT OF TRAINING AND PLACEMENT JOB DESCRIPTION This is to inform all students that M/s Epic Minds is conducting Placement Drive for the role of Front-End Developer – (Svelte / Svelte Kit) for all Branches of 2026 B.E Graduating Batch. Company Name M/s Epic Minds Role offered Front-End Developer – (Svelte / Svelte Kit) About the Role Create fast, accessible interfaces with Svelte and Svelte Kit. Build dynamic, theme able UIs where variable changes update the look & feel across the app. Morning Shift (IST). Roles and Responsibilities 1. Develop responsive UI with Svelte/SvelteKit (routing, SSR, endpoints). 2. Implement design tokens/CSS variables for on- the-fly theming (colors, spacing, typography, motion). 3. Integrate with backend APIs (REST/GraphQL) with robust error handling and caching. 4. Optimize performance (code-splitting, lazy loading, Core Web Vitals). 5. Uphold quality via TypeScript, unit/integration tests, and CI checks. Skills and Competency 1. Strong JavaScript/TypeScript and Svelte reactive patterns (stores, context). 2. CSS fundamentals, accessibility (WCAG), and responsive layouts. Sri Sai Vidya Vikas Shikshana Samithi ® SAI VIDYA INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY (Approved by AICTE, New Delhi, Affiliated to VTU, Recognized by Govt. of Karnataka) NBA Accredited, New Delhi (CSE, ECE, ISE), NAAC – “A” Grade RAJANUKUNTE, BANGALORE 560 064, KARNATAKA DEPARTMENT OF TRAINING AND PLACEMENT Phone: 080-28468191/96/97/98 * E-mail: placement@saividya.ac.in * URL www.saividya.ac.in 3. API integration patterns, auth flows, and routing guards. 4. Git workflows; testing with Vitest/Playwright/Jest. College Registration Link https://forms.gle/vCjdqzuivd29c7Dh8 Last Date to Apply 15-11-2025 by 12 PM Wishing you all the best Placement Officer SVIT
